file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  description: This is a sample implementation of an Open Prediction Service compatible service
  title: scikit-learn service
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
- url: http://0.0.0.0:8080
  description: local docker instance server
tags:
- description: Endpoints related to the capabilities of the server
  name: info
- description: Endpoints related to the discovery of machine learning models and deployments
  name: discover
- description: Endpoints to run deployed models
  name: run
paths:
  /capabilities:
    get:
      description: Returns the server capabilities
      operationId: get_capabilities
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Capabilities'
          description: Successful Response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Get Server Capabilities
      tags:
      - info
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.info_controller
  /endpoints:
    get:
      operationId: list_endpoints
      parameters:
      - description: ID of model
        explode: true
        in: query
        name: model_id
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
        style: form
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaginationLimitParam'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaginationOffsetParam'
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaginationTotalCountParam'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Endpoints'
          description: Successful Response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: List Endpoints
      tags:
      - discover
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.discover_controller
  /endpoints/{endpoint_id}:
    get:
      description: Returns an ML Endpoint.
      operationId: get_endpoint_by_id
      parameters:
      - description: ID of endpoint
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: endpoint_id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Endpoint'
          description: Successful Response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Get an Endpoint
      tags:
      - discover
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.discover_controller
  /info:
    get:
      description: Returns a health check of underlying service and additional information
      operationId: get_info
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServerInfo'
          description: Health Check
      summary: Get Server Information and Status
      tags:
      - info
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.info_controller
  /models:
    get:
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaginationLimitParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaginationOffsetParam'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PaginationTotalCountParam'
      description: Returns the list of ML Models.
      operationId: list_models
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Models'
          description: Successful Response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: List Models
      tags:
      - discover
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.discover_controller
  /models/{model_id}:
    get:
      description: Returns a ML model.
      operationId: get_model_by_id
      parameters:
      - description: ID of model
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: model_id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Model'
          description: Successful Response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Get a Model
      tags:
      - discover
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.discover_controller
  /predictions:
    post:
      operationId: prediction
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Prediction'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PredictionResponse'
          description: Successful Response
        default:
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
          description: Error
      summary: Call Prediction of specified Endpoint
      tags:
      - run
      x-openapi-router-controller: openapi_server.controllers.run_controller
components:
  parameters:
    ModelIDParam:
      description: ID of model
      explode: false
      in: path
      name: model_id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
      style: simple
    ModelIDParamQuery:
      description: ID of model
      explode: true
      in: query
      name: model_id
      required: false
      schema:
        type: string
      style: form
    PaginationOffsetParam:
      in: query
      name: offset
      schema:
        type: integer
        default: 0
      description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
      required: false
    PaginationLimitParam:
      in: query
      name: limit
      schema:
        type: integer
        default: 100
      description: The numbers of items to return
      required: false
    PaginationTotalCountParam:
      in: query
      name: total_count
      schema:
        type: boolean
        default: false
      description: Compute total number of item
      required: false
    EndpointIDParam:
      description: ID of endpoint
      explode: false
      in: path
      name: endpoint_id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
      style: simple
  schemas:
    Link:
      description: linked relationship to a typed resource.
      properties:
        rel:
          description: type of relationship for this resource.
          type: string
        href:
          description: URI of the linked resource.
          type: string
      type: object
    PredictionResponse:
      description: Response of a Prediction
      example:
        result:
          prediction: label 1
          probability:
          - 0.2
          - 0.4
          - 0.2
          timeElapsed: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
          inError: false
      properties:
        result:
          additionalProperties: true
          description: Result of a Prediction
          example:
            prediction: label 1
            probability:
            - 0.2
            - 0.4
            - 0.2
            timeElapsed: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
            inError: false
          type: object
      type: object
    Endpoints:
      description: List of Machine Learning Endpoints
      example:
        endpoints:
        - id: 8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          name: South America gigafactory
          status: in_service
          deployed_at: 2020-07-24T17:53:47.909Z
          links:
          - rel: self
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          - rel: model
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        - id: 8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          name: South America gigafactory
          status: in_service
          deployed_at: 2020-07-24T17:53:47.909Z
          links:
          - rel: self
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          - rel: model
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
      properties:
        endpoints:
          description: List of Endpoints
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Endpoint'
          type: array
      title: List of Machine Learning Endpoints
    EndpointUpdate:
      description: Represents a way to access to the runnable Prediction
      example:
        name: South America gigafactory
        status: in_service
        links:
        - rel: model
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
      properties:
        name:
          description: Name of Version
          title: Name
          type: string
        status:
          description: Status of the Endpoint
          enum:
          - out_of_service
          - creating
          - updating
          - under_maintenance
          - rolling_back
          - in_service
          - deleting
          - failed
          title: Status
          type: string
        links:
          description: Optional array of typed linked resources
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link'
          type: array
      title: Machine Learning Model Endpoint Update
      type: object
    EndpointCreation:
      description: Represents a way to access to the runnable Prediction
      example:
        name: South America gigafactory
        status: in_service
        links:
        - rel: model
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
      properties:
        name:
          description: Name of Version
          title: Name
          type: string
        status:
          description: Status of the Endpoint
          enum:
          - out_of_service
          - creating
          - updating
          - under_maintenance
          - rolling_back
          - in_service
          - deleting
          - failed
          title: Status
          type: string
        links:
          description: Optional array of typed linked resources
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link'
          type: array
      required:
      - name
      - status
      title: Machine Learning Model Endpoint Creation
      type: object
    Endpoint:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/EndpointCreation'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Endpoint_allOf'
      description: Represents a way to access to the runnable Prediction
      example:
        id: 8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        name: South America gigafactory
        status: in_service
        deployed_at: 2020-07-24T17:53:47.909Z
        links:
        - rel: self
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        - rel: model
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
      title: Machine Learning Model Endpoint
    Models:
      description: List of Machine Learning Models
      example:
        models:
        - id: 8bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          name: 'Linear regression #1'
          input_schema:
          - name: 'feature #1'
            order: 1
            type: integer
          - name: 'feature #2'
            order: 2
            type: double
          output_schema:
            prediction:
              type: string
            probability:
              type: array
              items: double
            timeElapsed:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            inError:
              type: boolean
          created_at: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
          modified_at: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
          version: v0
          links:
          - rel: self
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          - rel: endpoint
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/841ff27c-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          - rel: endpoint
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          metadata:
            description: model description
            author: admin
            metrics:
            - name: accuracy
              value: "0.97"
        - id: 8bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          name: 'Linear regression #1'
          input_schema:
          - name: 'feature #1'
            order: 1
            type: integer
          - name: 'feature #2'
            order: 2
            type: double
          output_schema:
            prediction:
              type: string
            probability:
              type: array
              items: double
            timeElapsed:
              type: string
              format: date-time
            inError:
              type: boolean
          created_at: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
          modified_at: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
          version: v0
          links:
          - rel: self
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          - rel: endpoint
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/841ff27c-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          - rel: endpoint
            href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
          metadata:
            description: model description
            author: admin
            metrics:
            - name: accuracy
              value: "0.97"
      properties:
        models:
          description: List of models
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Model'
          type: array
      title: List of Machine Learning Models
      type: object
    ModelUpdate:
      description: Machine learning model data
      example:
        name: 'Linear regression #1'
        input_schema:
        - name: 'feature #1'
          order: 1
          type: integer
        - name: 'feature #2'
          order: 2
          type: double
        output_schema:
          prediction:
            type: string
          probability:
            type: array
            items: double
          timeElapsed:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          inError:
            type: boolean
        version: v0
        links:
        - rel: endpoint
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/841ff27c-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        - rel: endpoint
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        metadata:
          description: model description
          author: admin
          metrics:
          - name: accuracy
            value: "0.97"
      properties:
        name:
          description: Name of model
          title: Name
          type: string
        input_schema:
          description: Input schema of ml model
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Feature'
          title: Input Schema
          type: array
        output_schema:
          additionalProperties: true
          description: Model output schema
          title: OutputSchema
          type: object
        version:
          description: version of the model
          type: string
        links:
          description: optional array of typed linked resources
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link'
          type: array
        metadata:
          additionalProperties: true
          description: additional metadata
          properties:
            description:
              type: string
          type: object
      title: Machine Learning Model Update
      type: object
    ModelCreation:
      description: Machine learning model data
      example:
        name: 'Linear regression #1'
        input_schema:
        - name: 'feature #1'
          order: 1
          type: integer
        - name: 'feature #2'
          order: 2
          type: double
        output_schema:
          prediction:
            type: string
          probability:
            type: array
            items: double
          timeElapsed:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          inError:
            type: boolean
        version: v0
        links:
        - rel: endpoint
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/841ff27c-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        - rel: endpoint
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        metadata:
          description: model description
          author: admin
          metrics:
          - name: accuracy
            value: "0.97"
      properties:
        name:
          description: Name of model
          title: Name
          type: string
        input_schema:
          description: Input schema of ml model
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Feature'
          title: Input Schema
          type: array
        output_schema:
          additionalProperties: true
          description: Model output schema
          title: OutputSchema
          type: object
        version:
          description: version of the model
          type: string
        links:
          description: optional array of typed linked resources
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link'
          type: array
        metadata:
          additionalProperties: true
          description: additional metadata
          properties:
            description:
              type: string
          type: object
      required:
      - name
      title: Machine Learning Model Creation
      type: object
    Model:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModelUpdate'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Model_allOf'
      description: Machine learning model data
      example:
        id: 8bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        name: 'Linear regression #1'
        input_schema:
        - name: 'feature #1'
          order: 1
          type: integer
        - name: 'feature #2'
          order: 2
          type: double
        output_schema:
          prediction:
            type: string
          probability:
            type: array
            items: double
          timeElapsed:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          inError:
            type: boolean
        created_at: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
        modified_at: 2020-07-24T16:53:47.909Z
        version: v0
        links:
        - rel: self
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/models/78bcb500-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        - rel: endpoint
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/841ff27c-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        - rel: endpoint
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
        metadata:
          description: model description
          author: admin
          metrics:
          - name: accuracy
            value: "0.97"
      title: Machine Learning Model
    Feature:
      description: Feature of a model
      properties:
        name:
          description: name of the feature
          title: Name
          type: string
        order:
          description: Position of feature in method signature
          title: Order
          type: integer
        type:
          description: type of feature. Can be python type or numpy type
          title: Type
          type: string
      required:
      - name
      - order
      - type
      title: Feature
      type: object
    Error:
      description: Error
      properties:
        error:
          description: Error message
          title: Error Message
          type: string
      type: object
    InputSchema:
      description: Input schema of ml model
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Feature'
      title: Input Schema
      type: array
    OutputSchema:
      additionalProperties: true
      description: Model output schema
      title: OutputSchema
      type: object
    ServerInfo:
      description: Information of the service
      example:
        info:
          description: Open Prediction Service for Scikit Learn models based on OPSv2 API
        status: ok
      properties:
        info:
          additionalProperties: true
          description: Information of the service
          example:
            description: Open Prediction Service for Scikit Learn models based on OPSv2 API
          title: Information
          type: object
        status:
          description: Status of the service
          enum:
          - ok
          - error
          title: Status
          type: string
        error:
          description: Error if status in error
          title: Error Message
          type: string
      required:
      - info
      - status
      title: ServerInfo
      type: object
    Capabilities:
      description: Available capabilities from this service
      example:
        capabilities:
        - info
        - discover
        - run
      properties:
        capabilities:
          description: Capabilities of the service
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Capability'
          title: Capabilities
          type: array
      required:
      - capabilities
      title: Capabilities
      type: object
    Capability:
      description: capability of a service
      enum:
      - info
      - discover
      - manage
      - run
      title: Capability
      type: string
    Parameter:
      description: Parameter for ml model invocation
      properties:
        name:
          description: Name of the feature
          title: Name
          type: string
        value:
          anyOf:
          - type: integer
          - type: number
          - type: string
          - type: boolean
          description: Value of the feature
          title: Value
      required:
      - name
      - value
      title: Parameter
      type: object
    Prediction:
      description: All information needed for model invocation
      example:
        parameters:
        - name: name
          value: John Doe
        - name: age
          value: 17
        - name: ofAge
          value: false
        - name: score
          value: 0.42
        target:
        - rel: endpoint
          href: http://open-prediction-service.org/endpoints/8c2af534-cdce-11ea-87d0-0242ac130003
      properties:
        target:
          description: Add at least a relation to an `endpoint`to be able to call
            the correct prediction. Eventually add also a `model` in case endpoints
            contains multiple models.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link'
          minItems: 1
          type: array
        parameters:
          description: Model parameters
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Parameter'
          title: Parameters
          type: array
      required:
      - parameters
      - target
      title: Prediction Payload
      type: object
    Endpoint_allOf:
      properties:
        id:
          description: Id of Version
          title: Id
          type: string
        deployed_at:
          description: date of the Version
          format: date-time
          type: string
      required:
      - deployed_at
      - id
      type: object
    Model_allOf:
      properties:
        id:
          description: ID of model
          title: ID
          type: string
        created_at:
          description: date of the creation of the model
          format: date-time
          type: string
        modified_at:
          description: date of the update of the model
          format: date-time
          type: string
      required:
      - created_at
      - id
      - modified_at
      type: object

Error: notImplemented: path "/predictions": post: requestBody: contents: application/json: generate schema: field parameters: item: field value: anyOf: complex anyOf not implemented
